titleStmt.title: By the King. His Majesties gratious proclamation to the cities of London and VVestminster.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
"Given at Our court at Ayno this 27 of October, in the eighteenth yeare of Our raigne."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
